mapper.update: update t_role set create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, default_role = #{defaultRole,jdbcType=BIT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, create_by, create_time, del_flag, update_by, update_time, data_type, default_role, description, `name` from t_role where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
